summary: Village People is an American disco group famous for their fun costumes and exciting music. They were created by French producers and first targeted the gay community. The group's name comes from a neighborhood in New York known for its gay culture. Their songs, like "Macho Man" and "Y.M.C.A.," became huge hits worldwide. Even though the original members have changed, the group is still popular today. The song "Y.M.C.A." is now considered an important part of American history.
title: Village People
